Class StringCharSource

  • java.lang.Object
    • chav1961.purelib.streams.charsource.StringCharSource
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CharacterSource

    public class StringCharSource
extends Object
implements CharacterSource

    This class implements CharacterSource interface by single string

        public void back()
          throws ContentException
        Description copied from interface: CharacterSource
